id_n.desc: Unique positive numeric identifier for filing unit

income_wage_l.desc: Gross income from Salary, other personal income based on employment and pensions

form.2019: Obtained from data on Salaries & codes

income_add_l.desc: Gross income from additional income on which contributions have not been paid

income_supvr_l.desc: Gross income from Income of members of the management bodies and the supervisory bodies in the trade companies

income_officials_l.desc: Gross income from Income of officials, MPs, councilors

income_jury_l.desc: Gross income from Allowances for justices and jury members, forensic experts and receivers

income_manu_l.desc: Gross income from Fees for members of Academy of Sciences and Arts

income_contract_l.desc: Gross income from Income under a contract for occasional or temporary performance of services

income_agr_med_l.desc: Gross income from Revenues from agricultural products and medicinal herbs and berries

gross_i_l.desc: Gross income from 'other income of labour'

form.2019: Obtained from data on Salaries & codes

income_prop_c.desc: Gross income from Property income and property rights (rents)

income_dividends_c.desc: Gross income from Dividends and other income earned by participating in the profit

income_interest_c.desc: Gross income from Interest on loans, bonds and other securities

income_gamesch_c.desc: Gross income from Winnings from games of chance

total_gross_i.desc: Total gross income from labor and capital

deductions_income_prop_c.desc: Deductions from Property income and property rights (rents) (kind_8)

deductions_income_other_claimed_c.desc: Deductions from other income earned by participating in the profit (kind_10)

deductions_income_prop_c_rate.desc: Deductions rate from property income and property rights (rents) (kind_8)

deductions_income_other_c_rate.desc: Deductions rate from and other income earned by participating in the profit (kind_10)

exemption_income_gamesch_c.desc: calculated deduction/exemption from grames of chance

tax_base_income_salary_l.desc: Tax base from Salary, other personal income based on employment and pensions

tax_base_income_add_l.desc: Tax base income from additional income on which contributions have not been paid

tax_base_income_supvr_l.desc: Tax base from Income of members of the management bodies and the supervisory bodies in the trade companies

tax_base_income_officials_l.desc: Tax base from Income of officials, MPs, councilors

tax_base_income_jury_l.desc: Tax base from Allowances for justices and jury members, forensic experts and receivers

tax_base_income_manu_l.desc: Tax base from Fees for members of MANU

tax_base_income_contract_l.desc: Tax base from Income under a contract for occasional or temporary performance of services

tax_base_income_agr_med_l.desc: Tax base from Revenues from agricultural products and medicinal herbs and berries

tax_base_income_prop_c.desc: Tax base from Property income and property rights (rents)

tax_base_income_dividends_c.desc: Tax base from Dividends and other income earned by participating in the profit

tax_base_income_interest_c.desc: Tax base from Interest on loans, bonds and other securities

tax_base_income_gamesch_c.desc: Tax base from Winnings from games of chance

te_disable_unemp.desc: Dummy variable if Tax Ependiture if te = 1 otherwise not exists

te_special_comp.desc: Dummy variable if Tax Ependiture if te = 1 otherwise not exists

te_TIDZ.desc: Dummy variable if Tax Ependiture if te = 1 otherwise not exists

rent_house_business.desc: Is rental capital income from property houses or businesses

rent_non_house_business.desc: Is rental capital income from property other than houses or businesses

rent_actual_costing.desc: Actual costing method used for property

rent_actual_cost.desc: Actual cost from income from property

income_sculpture.desc: Is capital income from sculptural works, tapestry, ceramic-plastics, artistic ceramics and stained glass

income_artistic_photography.desc: for artistic photography, wall painting and painting in space etc.

income_paintings.desc: Is capital income from for paintings, graphic works, industrial modelling by producing models,  literary work etc.

income_music_ballet.desc: Is capital income from for works of art in the area of serious music, ballet, opera and film-act etc.

income_translations_lectures.desc: Is capital income from for translations (except translations of literary works), lectures and similar intellectual works

income_stage_music.desc: Is capital income from for performing stage programs of popular and folk music

income_copyrights_other.desc: Is capital income from for other income and industrial property works, which are not mentioned in the previous provisions

income_copyrights_actual_costing.desc: Actual costing method used for copyrights

income_copyrights_actual_cost.desc: Actual cost from income from copyrights

income_claimed_other_c.desc: Is capital income claimed from other income

min_ssc.desc: Minimum social security contributions calculated from min_base_wage

max_ssc.desc: Maximum social security contributions calculated from max_base_salary

ssc_w_calc.desc: Calculated Social Security Contributions computed as 0.2675 of Gross Income

ssc_w_rem_cap.desc: Calculated Social Security Contributions computed as 0.2675 of Gross Income

total_ssc_w.desc: Calculated Social Security Contributions computed as 0.2675 of Gross Income

cal_ssc_inc_temp_calc.desc: Calculated Social Security Contributions computed as 0.2675 of Gross Income

personal_allowance_new.desc: Calculated personal allowance change (%) if personal allowance change is introduced

pit_w.desc: Pit liability from wages (pit-ssc-personal allowance)*tax rate

tax_base_agr.desc: Tax base calulated for income from agriculture and medicine

tax_base_inc_temp.desc: Tax base calulated for income from agriculture and medicine

tax_base_other.desc: Tax base calulated for other labor income

tti_w_I.desc: Total taxable income from wages and 'other income of labour'

tti_w_I_behavior.desc: Total taxable income from labor and 'other income of labour' adjusted for behavior

pit_w_I.desc: Pit liability from labor and 'other income of labour'(gross income-deductions)*tax rate

tti_wd.desc: Tax base for capial for those sources of income that do not have deductions

deductions_rental_income_c.desc: Deductions from income from property/rental incomes

deductions_copyrights_income_c.desc: Deductions from income from copyrights income

deductions_income_other_c.desc: Deductions from income for other capital income

tti_c_a.desc: Tax case (total) from capital income except games of chance

tti_c_g.desc: Tax base from capital income from games of chance

tti_c.desc: Total tax base from capital income

tti_c_a_behavior.desc: Total taxable income from 'capital'(gross income-deductions) adjusted for behavior

tti_c_g_behavior.desc: Total taxable income from 'capital'(gross income-deductions) adjusted for behavior

net_w_I.desc: post tax income from  all labor including wages
